page.title: 15A day in Susan's life
page.content: On Wednesday my mum or dad brings me a cup of tea. I take ages to get up. When I'm ready I wait down the driveway for Wendy. She takes me to school. I do some work and then it is assembly. At assembly we sing or talk about things. Then it is playtime. On Wednesday the playgroup came. My friend is Sarah. She is four. After play I finish my work. Then it is dinner time. I have school dinners. After we have another playtime then it is swimming. I am in the second group. Then it is story. Our story is called 'Little House in the Big Wood'. Then we get our things. We stand behind our chairs. Then we go out. Wendy or Mummy comes to pick us up.
